original_title: Another accident kills 2, injures 29 in Ambanpola
original_body_lines: In the wake of yesterday's bus accident in Manampitiya, another accident was reported this morning in the Ambanpola police area, injuring 29 passengers and resulting in two deaths on the bus, the Police said.
They said the bus was carrying pilgrims and travelling from Padeniya to Anuradhapura.
The bus crashed on to a container truck parked on the side of the road. Two people, aged 32 and 71, residents of the Thalawa area, died, and 29 were injured.
Six females and one male were admitted to the Ambanpola hospital. Another 18 females and four males were admitted to the Galgamuwa hospital.
The bodies of the deceased were laid out at the Galgamuwa hospital. Ambanpola police are conducting investigations. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
